creator: Claude AI

subject: Computer Science

p5.js
dublinCore.description: An interactive visualization helping students understand that p5.js has (0,0) at the top-left corner with Y increasing downward.

learningObjectives: Understand that the p5.js coordinate system has (0,0) at the top-left corner
Recognize that Y coordinates increase downward
Apply this knowledge to position elements accurately in p5.js sketches

controls.description: Interactive point follows mouse cursor and displays current coordinates

limitations: Does not demonstrate negative coordinates or coordinate transformations

learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of this concept
Explore this concept through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of this concept to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on this concept
